Main Project¶

class messaging.slack_messenger.SlackMessenger(slack_api, name='qinj')[source]¶

A module to interface with Slack API

post(text, board)[source]¶

post message to a discussion channel

rtm_async()[source]¶

starts a thread to passively listen for commands .. note:: this is really dumb, multithreading is not viable for multiple teams need to switch to multiprocessing as there are now shared resource

rtm_sync(channel)[source]¶

blocking code to listen for response

say(text, channel)[source]¶

post a message to a direct message channel
